articles.description: If you have kids that use a Nintendo Switch, you might worry that they could potentially talk to strangers in online-connected games. Luckily, Nintendo provides an easy way to turn off communication with others in their Parental Controls app for smartphones. …

articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Apple Watch Can Detect Covid-19 Before Symptoms Arise, New Study Shows - Forbes
articles.description: A new study reveals that Apple Watch and some other smartwatches are capable of spotting whether a wearer has Covid-19 even before testing confirms it.
articles.content:
Apple Watch could be smart enough to know you have Covid-19 before testing would confirm it. 
David Phelan
